bloc.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large group of people or countries with the same political aims, working together
bloc.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a group of countries, usually with the same economic system, who have an official trading agreement with each other
bloc.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: negotiations for the incorporation of Mexico into a trade bloc with the USA
bloc.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a group of countries or people who have been united together for a particular political purpose
